item.description:
Everyone I know who has gone to Alina's Restaurant in Deerfield has raved about the food. I have been there for appetizers and I can truly say they were melt in your mouth delicious!

Chef Martin is a wonderful, caring man who is very excited to host us that evening and it's a great way to kick off the upcoming holiday season with friends old and new.

Nestled in the center of South Deerfield, former location of Sienna’s Restaurant, Alina’s offers Italian Cuisine with a Mediterranean flair. Head chef and owner, Martin Amaya, formerly executive chef at
Carmelina’s, has opened his own restaurant. “I wanted to have a place of my own, where I can create and serve my favorite dishes and incorporate my family with me”, says Amaya.

An interesting little piece from Russelnod.com [local food blog]: http://www.russelnod....


and here from the reviews:

TripAdvisor: I have enjoyed numerous dinners at Alina's and it is always a delight to the senses! From the delicious Martinis to the exquisite entrees I can't wait to go back again to try yet another creation from Chef Martin. The servers have always been friendly and the atmosphere is elegant and warm. I continue to be a devoted fan and now measure other restaurants' offerings against Alina's stellar fare - however, few have met my expectations. My recommendations: Lobster Ravioli or stuff aged sirloin & the Michelangelo Chianti.

We hope to see you there!

bon apetit...

Jessica & Christine
item.name: The Fabulous and Underrated Alina's in Deerfield!
